attributes.action: Alow members of the ghurka regiment to remain in the United Kingdom after their service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is shameful that members of the Ghurka Regiment are not allowed to remain in the UK after their service to this country. They have earned that right through their Bravery, Loyalty and Commitment to this country. They are our true allies!.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
